programme.title: Ganjil Ep4
programme.desc: Di alam mimpi, Nabila dan Mary bertemu dengan orang yang berkongsi luka mereka, diri mereka semasa kecil. Rahsia terbongkar semasa zaman kanak-kanak mereka berjalan mereka ke lorong ingatan.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: Semasa virus zombi merebak di Korea Selatan, penumpang bergelut untuk bertahan di dalam kereta api dari Seoul ke Busan.

programme.title: The Witch: Part 2 The Other One
programme.desc: Selepas seorang gadis muncul sebagai satu-satunya yang terselamat dalam serbuan berdarah ke atas kemudahan penyelidikan di sebalik Program rahsia, dia diselamatkan oleh sepasang orang awam yang tidak lama kemudian menyedari bahawa lebih banyak bahaya menanti.

programme.title: Lerai Mimpi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zakiah yang mempunyai cita-cita menjadi seorang pelakon terkenal. Walaupun dia pernah menjadi pelakon tambahan untuk sebuah drama, namun rezekinya dalam bidang lakonan masih samar. Bakat Zakiah kemudiannya dikesan oleh seorang pengarah wanita bernama Sarah. Semasa melakonkan watak utama, Zakiah terpaksa menghadapi pelbagai cabaran termasuklah daripada ibu sendiri yang tidak merestui dia menjadi seorang pelakon.

programme.title: Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Ebby, Muda dan Halim adalah tiga orang pemuda yang baru datang dari kampung ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari pekerjaan. Di Kuala Lumpur, mereka telah tinggal dirumah rakan sekampung mereka. Pelbagai peristiwa yang mereka alami di Kuala Lumpur.

programme.title: Black Maria
programme.desc: Pada tahun 1978, kemalangan bot memisahkan keluarga Tuan Hashim, menyebabkan dua anaknya, Rashid dan Rasul, hilang di laut. Dua puluh tiga tahun kemudian, Azman, bekas tentera elit, menyelamatkan Maria daripada pembunuh bersiri. Razlan, abang Maria yang menghidap kanser, mengupah Azman untuk melindunginya. Sementara itu, Izani, ahli perniagaan berjaya, mengetahui dia anak angkat dan menerima tawaran Razlan untuk menguruskan keluarganya. Ketika Razlan diculik dan wang tebusan diminta, keluarga bersatu di Kota Bharu, di mana mereka menemui kebenaran bahawa Azman dan Izani ialah anak yang hilang. Namun, kebahagiaan itu singkat apabila mereka sekali lagi kehilangan ahli keluarga tersayang.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Senjakala
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khalisa, yang masih bersedih atas kematian tunangnya dalam kemalangan, mula mengalami mimpi aneh yang memanggilnya pulang ke Kampung Senja Lama. Bersama sahabatnya, Isabella, Khalisa kembali ke rumah keluarganya dan terkejut mendapati Opah Maimoon masih hidup. Di kampung itu, Khalisa bertemu Armand, seorang lelaki misteri yang dipulaukan kerana membela saka. Apabila hubungan Khalisa dengan Armand menjadi semakin rapat, dia mula membongkar rahsia keluarganya iaitu saka yang sepatutnya diwarisi oleh ibunya telah berpindah kepada keluarga Armand. Kini, saka itu mahu kembali kepada pewaris asalnya iaitu Khalisa. Namun, Armand yang jatuh cinta dengannya enggan melepaskan saka itu. Mampukah Khalisa memutuskan perjanjian yang telah mengikat keluarganya selama ini?

programme.title: Orang Kampung Otak Kimia
programme.desc: Dipandang rendah oleh keluarga dan masyarakat kerana gagal dalam peperiksaan, Os mula mencipta satu formula. Os yang bijak dalam kimia dan biologi, mencipta formula yang membolehkan haiwan dan orang bisu boleh berkata-kata. Penemuan tersebut mula menarik minat seorang ahli perniagaan - namun malangnya dia ditipu.

programme.title: Korban Hari Raya
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga hidup dalam serba kemewahan. Oleh kerana sibuk mencari wang ringgit, si ayah dan ibu memandang ringan tentang pendidikan anak-anak. Apabila meningkat dewasa, Rahman menjadi liar. Ibu bapanya mengahwinkan Rahman dengan sepupunya, Norizan yang berpendidikan tinggi dan baik pekerti. Sebagai seorang isteri, Norizan cuba untuk mengubah sikap Rahman daripada terus hanyut.

programme.title: Komplot
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zali, seorang penjaga parking yang mendapat tahu bahawa abang iparnya, Rashid bukan seperti yang dikatakan. Apabila anak saudaranya diculik, Zali cuba untuk membantu namun dia mula mengesyaki ada sesuatu yang tidak kena mengenai kes penculikan tersebut.

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Perjalanan cinta seorang penyanyi rock terkenal dengan kekasihnya yang melalui pelbagai cabaran. Awie dan Wati telah bercinta sejak zaman persekolahan namun ditentang oleh abang Wati, Azman. Muncul pula Ziana, penyanyi baru yang sukakan Awie. Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Lerai Mimpi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zakiah yang mempunyai cita-cita menjadi seorang pelakon terkenal. Walaupun dia pernah menjadi pelakon tambahan untuk sebuah drama, namun rezekinya dalam bidang lakonan masih samar. Bakat Zakiah kemudiannya dikesan oleh seorang pengarah wanita bernama Sarah. Semasa melakonkan watak utama, Zakiah terpaksa menghadapi pelbagai cabaran termasuklah daripada ibu sendiri yang tidak merestui dia menjadi seorang pelakon.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Black Maria
programme.desc: Pada tahun 1978, kemalangan bot memisahkan keluarga Tuan Hashim, menyebabkan dua anaknya, Rashid dan Rasul, hilang di laut. Dua puluh tiga tahun kemudian, Azman, bekas tentera elit, menyelamatkan Maria daripada pembunuh bersiri. Razlan, abang Maria yang menghidap kanser, mengupah Azman untuk melindunginya. Sementara itu, Izani, ahli perniagaan berjaya, mengetahui dia anak angkat dan menerima tawaran Razlan untuk menguruskan keluarganya. Ketika Razlan diculik dan wang tebusan diminta, keluarga bersatu di Kota Bharu, di mana mereka menemui kebenaran bahawa Azman dan Izani ialah anak yang hilang. Namun, kebahagiaan itu singkat apabila mereka sekali lagi kehilangan ahli keluarga tersayang.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Senjakala
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khalisa, yang masih bersedih atas kematian tunangnya dalam kemalangan, mula mengalami mimpi aneh yang memanggilnya pulang ke Kampung Senja Lama. Bersama sahabatnya, Isabella, Khalisa kembali ke rumah keluarganya dan terkejut mendapati Opah Maimoon masih hidup. Di kampung itu, Khalisa bertemu Armand, seorang lelaki misteri yang dipulaukan kerana membela saka. Apabila hubungan Khalisa dengan Armand menjadi semakin rapat, dia mula membongkar rahsia keluarganya iaitu saka yang sepatutnya diwarisi oleh ibunya telah berpindah kepada keluarga Armand. Kini, saka itu mahu kembali kepada pewaris asalnya iaitu Khalisa. Namun, Armand yang jatuh cinta dengannya enggan melepaskan saka itu. Mampukah Khalisa memutuskan perjanjian yang telah mengikat keluarganya selama ini?

programme.title: Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Ebby, Muda dan Halim adalah tiga orang pemuda yang baru datang dari kampung ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari pekerjaan. Di Kuala Lumpur, mereka telah tinggal dirumah rakan sekampung mereka. Pelbagai peristiwa yang mereka alami di Kuala Lumpur.

programme.title: Korban Hari Raya
programme.desc: Sebuah keluarga hidup dalam serba kemewahan. Oleh kerana sibuk mencari wang ringgit, si ayah dan ibu memandang ringan tentang pendidikan anak-anak. Apabila meningkat dewasa, Rahman menjadi liar. Ibu bapanya mengahwinkan Rahman dengan sepupunya, Norizan yang berpendidikan tinggi dan baik pekerti. Sebagai seorang isteri, Norizan cuba untuk mengubah sikap Rahman daripada terus hanyut.

programme.title: Orang Kampung Otak Kimia
programme.desc: Dipandang rendah oleh keluarga dan masyarakat kerana gagal dalam peperiksaan, Os mula mencipta satu formula. Os yang bijak dalam kimia dan biologi, mencipta formula yang membolehkan haiwan dan orang bisu boleh berkata-kata. Penemuan tersebut mula menarik minat seorang ahli perniagaan - namun malangnya dia ditipu.

programme.title: Komplot
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zali, seorang penjaga parking yang mendapat tahu bahawa abang iparnya, Rashid bukan seperti yang dikatakan. Apabila anak saudaranya diculik, Zali cuba untuk membantu namun dia mula mengesyaki ada sesuatu yang tidak kena mengenai kes penculikan tersebut.

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Perjalanan cinta seorang penyanyi rock terkenal dengan kekasihnya yang melalui pelbagai cabaran. Awie dan Wati telah bercinta sejak zaman persekolahan namun ditentang oleh abang Wati, Azman. Muncul pula Ziana, penyanyi baru yang sukakan Awie. Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Lerai Mimpi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zakiah yang mempunyai cita-cita menjadi seorang pelakon terkenal. programme.desc: Dr Jill Ilustre seems to have it all: a fulfilling career and loving family. However, her world turns upside down when she catches her husband, David, in a long-term affair with her patient, Lexy.

programme.title: (DL) TVS Terkini
programme.desc: Terkini TVS brings the latest breaking news, offering quick and essential updates from both within the country and around the globe.

programme.title: Weaving And Craft Ep1
programme.desc: Exploring the vibrant world of traditional handicrafts and textiles, showcasing the living culture, identity, and heritage within Sarawak's rich diversity.

programme.title: Bornean Stories S3 Ep2
programme.desc: These collection of six short documentaries aims to tell the tales of Borneo emphasizing on its culture, history, tradition and environment.

programme.title: Stories In Motion Ep1
programme.desc: Five choreographers in Sarawak are given two weeks to create a story using a surprise 'wildcard style', incorporating unique Sarawak genres or styles.

programme.title: (L) Berita Wilayah TVS
programme.desc: Berita Wilayah TVS membawakan berita dari negeri-negeri di seluruh negara.

programme.title: The Food That Binds The Nation Ep11
programme.desc: Sebuah dokumentari kembara gastronomi yang merentas dari Perlis ke Sarawak, memperkenalkan keunikan juadah berbilang budaya yang memupuk perpaduan dalam kepelbagaian selera.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Weaving And Craft Ep1
programme.desc: Exploring the vibrant world of traditional handicrafts and textiles, showcasing the living culture, identity, and heritage within Sarawak's rich diversity.

programme.title: Lombak Rindok Go Ep11
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan realiti yang memukau, menggabungkan elemen perjuangan, kerjasama, dan strategi dalam sebuah perlumbaan yang mendebarkan dari awal hingga akir.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA 740
programme.desc: UTAMA 740 memaparkan berita terkini yang menyeluruh dan padat dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Dialog TVS Ep93
programme.desc: Dialog TVS merupakan program bual bicara yang membincangkan mengenai perkembangan terkini serta topik-topik tertentu bersama pemimpin, pakar, penganalisis dan pemain industri.

programme.title: Sukan TVS S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: Kamek, Ali Wallace Ep11
programme.desc: Alfred Russel Wallace's study in Southeast Asia relied on Ali, a Malay teen from Sarawak, who helped collect 125,660 specimens over 8 years, contributing to The Malay Archipelago and earning global recognition in natural history.

programme.title: Borneo From Above S2 Ep1
programme.desc: To promote and highlighting development of Sarawak

programme.title: Pewaris Legasi Ep11
programme.desc: Dalam kebimbangan minat remaja pada kerjaya kraftangan, pewaris gigih menjaga warisan ini. Rancangan ini memaparkan kerjaya kraftangan di Malaysia, menyeru penonton menghargai usaha mempertahankannya demi generasi akan datang.

programme.title: Sumandak Takes Borneo Ep7
programme.desc: Dewi Remaja 2022 winner Tracie and two friends explore Borneos beautyfood, history, culture, nature, and diversitywhile uplifting communities through local social enterprises in this inspiring travelogue.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Goblin Ep5
programme.desc: Kim Shin, an immortal goblin, goes to find a human bride to remove an invisible sword from his chest and end his life. One day, school student Ji Eun-Tak confesses to him that she is the chosen one.

programme.title: 3 Mak Dara Ep12
programme.desc: 3 orang hos (Raja Azura, Rita Rudaini & Sh.Shahora) membawa perwatakan berbeza, memandu caravan ke pelbagai lokasi sekitar KL sambil berbincang isu semasa dan pelbagai topik menarik. Apabila satu isu besar timbul, mereka akan cuba menyelesaikan isu tersebut dengan sebaiknya

programme.title: Misteri Kedai Gunting Ep8
programme.desc: Kisah misteri yang dihantar oleh individu yang pernah mengalami peristiwa seram dan diceritakan semula oleh pencerita di dalam sebuah kedai gunting.

programme.title: Ninjao Ep11
programme.desc: Sekumpulan remaja/belia mengembara ke seluruh sarawak mencari lokasi pendakian mencabar untuk menguji ketahanan fizikal dan mental mereka.

programme.title: The Cloth Story Ep2
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keunikan batik, tenun, songket, busana dari peradaban melayu diselitkan dengan sedikit sejarah serta asal usul penghasilan kain.

programme.title: Borneo Dive Ep2
programme.desc: Explore the unique dive sites of Sabah and Sarawak, which attract both local and international divers. The region offers a rich variety of marine life for recreational and avid divers to observe.

programme.title: Stories In Motion Ep1
programme.desc: Five choreographers in Sarawak are given two weeks to create a story using a surprise 'wildcard style', incorporating unique Sarawak genres or styles.

programme.title: Tembawai Kanyuk Ep8
programme.desc: Empeting Anak Baongs longhouse has been picked to have their daily lives filmed. But things get hilariously when the villagers' conflicting secrets and hidden feelings begin to come to light.

programme.title: Pewaris Legasi Ep11
programme.desc: Dalam kebimbangan minat remaja pada kerjaya kraftangan, pewaris gigih menjaga warisan ini. Rancangan ini memaparkan kerjaya kraftangan di Malaysia, menyeru penonton menghargai usaha mempertahankannya demi generasi akan datang.

programme.title: Sumandak Takes Borneo Ep7
programme.desc: Dewi Remaja 2022 winner Tracie and two friends explore Borneos beautyfood, history, culture, nature, and diversitywhile uplifting communities through local social enterprises in this inspiring travelogue.

programme.title: Demam Viral Ep11
programme.desc: Two best friends, Annie and Junita, fake Annies viral singing fameJunitas voice, Annies face. Money flows in, but lies pile up. Tension rises. Will their friendship survive, or will their secret destroy them?

programme.title: Rock 4:Rockers Never Die
programme.desc: Band rock baharu RIMBA BARA 2 memulakan perjalanan untuk menghidupkan semula legasi RIMBA BARA dengan bantuan pengurus mereka, Dio (bekas roadie RIMBA BARA).

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka mengisahkan sekumpulan penunggang motosikal yang kasar berhenti di tepi jalan, dan tidak lama kemudian, kesemua merekakecuali Bobjatuh sakit secara misteri.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Berasal dari Bandung, Reyhan pergi ke kawasan konflik di Timur Tengah untuk kerja sukarela. Di sana, dia membantu seorang wanita Malaysia bernama Dewi dan jatuh cinta padanya. Apabila Dewi kembali ke negaranya, Reyhan memutuskan untuk mencarinya dan melamarnya. Namun, Dewi sudah mempunyai kekasih. Sementara itu, rakan zaman kanak-kanak Reyhan, Aliyah, turut menyimpan perasaan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Mariam dilahirkan bisu dan lembam. Satu satunya anak tunggal Maimon dan arwah Wak Jahid. Hidup dalam serba serbi kekurangan. Mengutip plastik kaca dan besi untuk imbuhan. Sini sana ada yang memberi bantuan. Mereka hidup bahagia berduaan. Kepala ikan bilis menjadi makanan kesukaan. Keadaan kesihatan Maimon semakin merosot. Maimon berhasrat untuk mencarikan calon buat Wok. Yakin dengan adanya lelaki yang sudi memperisterikan anaknya yang hodoh dan bodoh segalanya tentu tidak merisaukan dia andai mata sudah terpejam selamanya. Pelawaan dari kenalan rakannya untuk memperisterikan Wok, adalah satu berita yang sangat menggembirakan. Deris akad nikah dengan Wok dan segera dibawa pulang ke rumahnya di kota walaupun Wok seolah takut dan tidak mahu berenggang dengan Maimon dia akur kerana itu yang diminta oleh Maimon. Sekaki melangkah ke rumah Deris, Wok diheret kejam ke dalam bilik tanpa sempat menanggalkan tudungnya. Dikerjakan secukupnya itulah tanda malam pertama. Diperkosa dengan rakus oleh suami sendiri. Deris adalah bekas banduan yang cuba untuk berubah tetapi tidak mampu bertahan dan isthiqomah Deris. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Bini-biniku Gangster
programme.desc: Manja dan Herry adalah sepasang suami isteri yang sangat romantik dan saling sayang menyayangi. Tanpa disedari oleh Herry, Manja adalah ketua kumpulan kepada sebuah geng gengster di Kuala Lumpur. Di pejabat,Herry kerap dibuli Mat Saja termasuk menyuruh Herry menggantikan tempatnya semasa ulangtahun perkahwinan Manja dan Herry yang ke2. Manja bengang lalu menghantar orang-orangnya memukul Mat Saja.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yatim piatu yang dijaga oleh ibu saudaranya. Sebaliknya, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua insan yang berbeza ini bertemu secara kebetulan dan akhirnya menjalin hubungan. Kini, dalam "Adnan Sempit 2", Shaheizy Sam kembali memegang watak sebagai Adnan, mengisahkan cabaran dan dugaan dalam kehidupannya serta hubungannya dengan Nadia.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 3
programme.desc: NADIA dan WAWA disahkan mengandung! ADNAN gembira kerana akhirnya dia bakal menjadi seorang bapa. Dia bersedia untuk menjaga NADIA, tetapi sebaliknya, dia yang mengalami alahan pagi dan pelbagai gejala kehamilan. Sementara itu, WAWA dan BOBBY menjalani kehidupan yang sederhana dan menghadapi masalah kewangan. WAWA mula marah kepada BOBBY kerana mereka tidak mempunyai cukup wang semasa tempoh kehamilannya dan menjelang kelahiran. Sebagai seorang kawan yang baik, ADNAN meminjamkan wang kepada BOBBY. Namun, BOBBY tidak lagi berani meminta wang daripada ADNAN selepas dimarahi olehnya yang tertekan dengan keadaan NADIA. Akibat desakan hidup, BOBBY membuat keputusan untuk berlumba semula.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit Generasi GIG
programme.desc: Selepas menyelamatkan Nadia (Afifah Nasir), seorang wanita moden yang telah lama diminatinya, Adnan (Aiman Tino), seorang penghantar makanan, mula jatuh cinta tanpa menyedari bahawa dia mungkin terperangkap dalam rancangan tersembunyi wanita tersebut.

programme.title: Hantu Dalam Botol Kicap
programme.desc: Tiga kanak-kanak yang jahil melanggar peraturan di rumah nenek mereka, menyebabkan neraka terlepas bebas.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Mariam dilahirkan bisu dan lembam. Satu satunya anak tunggal Maimon dan arwah Wak Jahid. Hidup dalam serba serbi kekurangan. Mengutip plastik kaca dan besi untuk imbuhan. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Abang Long Fadil 2
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Fadil yang terjerumus ke dalam dunia mafia yang diketuai oleh Taji Samprit dan anaknya, Wak Doyok. Satu insiden menyebabkan Inspektor Wahab dan Inspektor Shuib mengesyaki Fadil sebagai Tiger, seorang pembunuh upahan profesional.

programme.title: Taikun
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua lelaki bernama Tai dan Kun, sahabat baik yang hanya meminati pergaduhan dan mencuri. Apabila tabiat buruk mereka menyebabkan mereka bertembung dan memukul teruk ahli geng Pink dan Purple, Tai dan Kun kemudian direkrut oleh ketua geng yang kagum dengan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Love Supermoon
programme.desc: mengisahkan seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita yang menjalani kehidupan masing-masing tetapi sering bertemu di majlis perkahwinan atau parti yang dianjurkan oleh rakan-rakan mereka. Mereka hanya mengenali antara satu sama lain melalui gosip yang didengar, namun berpura-pura tidak mengenali setiap kali bertemu.

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Mereka perlu meyakinkan pesaing Tuan Sidek bahawa bangunan tertentu berhantu apabila mereka terperangkap di dalamnya. Kecuali mereka tidak perlu meyakinkan kerana bangunan itu benar-benar dihantui oleh roh yang tidak tenteram. Roh memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk memenuhi hasrat terakhirnya

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi

Mereka hanya mengenali antara satu sama lain melalui gosip yang didengar, namun berpura-pura tidak mengenali setiap kali bertemu.

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Mereka perlu meyakinkan pesaing Tuan Sidek bahawa bangunan tertentu berhantu apabila mereka terperangkap di dalamnya. Kecuali mereka tidak perlu meyakinkan kerana bangunan itu benar-benar dihantui oleh roh yang tidak tenteram. Roh memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk memenuhi hasrat terakhirnya

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Rock 4:Rockers Never Die
programme.desc: Band rock baharu RIMBA BARA 2 memulakan perjalanan untuk menghidupkan semula legasi RIMBA BARA dengan bantuan pengurus mereka, Dio (bekas roadie RIMBA BARA).

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka mengisahkan sekumpulan penunggang motosikal yang kasar berhenti di tepi jalan, dan tidak lama kemudian, kesemua merekakecuali Bobjatuh sakit secara misteri.

programme.title: Bukan Cinta Malaikat
programme.desc: Berasal dari Bandung, Reyhan pergi ke kawasan konflik di Timur Tengah untuk kerja sukarela. Di sana, dia membantu seorang wanita Malaysia bernama Dewi dan jatuh cinta padanya. Apabila Dewi kembali ke negaranya, Reyhan memutuskan untuk mencarinya dan melamarnya. Namun, Dewi sudah mempunyai kekasih. Sementara itu, rakan zaman kanak-kanak Reyhan, Aliyah, turut menyimpan perasaan terhadapnya.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Alibi
programme.desc: Nazri berdepan situasi getir apabila isterinya, Bella, dan anaknya, Ayu, tanpa sengaja membunuh Johan, lelaki yang mengganggu Ayu. Dalam keadaan terdesak, mereka memutuskan untuk menyembunyikan mayat Johan. Dengan sedikit pengalaman dalam menghadapi situasi sukar, Nazri merangka alibi untuk keluarganya agar tidak ditangkap oleh polis, dengan bantuan Ray, pekerja upahan di rumahnya. Namun, Ray mula menunjukkan sisi gelapnya apabila dia mengancam mereka dengan video pembunuhan Johan yang dirakam secara rahsia. Dalam usaha menyelamatkan keluarganya, Nazri terpaksa berjuang melawan Ray, yang sebenarnya adalah seorang sosiopat berbahaya

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Wok
programme.desc: Mariam dilahirkan bisu dan lembam. Satu satunya anak tunggal Maimon dan arwah Wak Jahid. Hidup dalam serba serbi kekurangan. Mengutip plastik kaca dan besi untuk imbuhan. Sini sana ada yang memberi bantuan. Mereka hidup bahagia berduaan. Kepala ikan bilis menjadi makanan kesukaan. Keadaan kesihatan Maimon semakin merosot. Maimon berhasrat untuk mencarikan calon buat Wok. Yakin dengan adanya lelaki yang sudi memperisterikan anaknya yang hodoh dan bodoh segalanya tentu tidak merisaukan dia andai mata sudah terpejam selamanya. Pelawaan dari kenalan rakannya untuk memperisterikan Wok, adalah satu berita yang sangat menggembirakan. Deris akad nikah dengan Wok dan segera dibawa pulang ke rumahnya di kota walaupun Wok seolah takut dan tidak mahu berenggang dengan Maimon dia akur kerana itu yang diminta oleh Maimon. Sekaki melangkah ke rumah Deris, Wok diheret kejam ke dalam bilik tanpa sempat menanggalkan tudungnya. Dikerjakan secukupnya itulah tanda malam pertama. Diperkosa dengan rakus oleh suami sendiri. Deris adalah bekas banduan yang cuba untuk berubah tetapi tidak mampu bertahan dan isthiqomah Deris. Deris lelaki sex maniak dan mengalami tekanan dan pelbagai penyakit mental setelah sekian lama duduk di jel akibat kesalahan merogol.

programme.title: Geran
programme.desc: Ali dan Fatimah berasa kecewa dengan adik mereka, Mat Arip, apabila dia gagal pulang dengan geran tanah pusaka mereka. Ali perlu mencari Mat Arip, yang telah bergaul dengan kumpulan yang salah dan terlibat dalam perjudian serta perlumbaan haram, lalu membawanya pulang kepada bapa mereka, Pak Nayan.

programme.title: Mereka Yang Pergi Ep13
programme.desc: Mengungkap kisah-kisah menyentuh hati di sekeliling kita, tentang mereka yang kehilangan insan tersayang. Mampukah mereka kembali dalam kehangatan keluarga?

programme.title: The Sultan Empire Ep7
programme.desc: The Sultan Empire merupakan bentuk baharu Sultan, iaitu sebuah rancangan komedi sketsa bertemakan kerajaan yang dipenuhi dengan bintang jemputan.

programme.title: Indahnya Kebersamaan Ep3
programme.desc: Indahnya Kebersamaan ialah sebuah program tausiah yang dikendalikan oleh Mellya Baskarani bersama Prof. Dr. K.H. Nasaruddin Umar, M.A. Program ini memberi fokus kepada pelbagai permasalahan yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat, termasuk isu dalam kehidupan berumah tangga.

programme.title: Arjuna Sedang Galau Soalnya Lagi Trend
programme.desc: Sri mempunyai teman lelaki bernama Bobby, seorang pemuda kacak dari keluarga kaya. Namun, hatinya hancur apabila dia melihat Bobby bermesra dengan sahabat baiknya. Bukannya mengakui kesalahannya, Bobby pula berpura-pura menjadi mangsa. Malah, dia memberitahu ibunya bahawa abangnya, Arjuna atau lebih dikenali sebagai Juna, telah merampas Sri daripadanya.

programme.title: Inbox 2022 Ep6
programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep78
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Jatim Traveler Ep15
programme.desc: Jatim Traveler membawa anda mengembara menerokai keunikan kulinari, keindahan destinasi pelancongan, dan tradisi istimewa di serata pelosok Jawa Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep231
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Emang Mukanya Boleh Selucu Ini Mba?
programme.desc: Diki dan Fandi bekerjasama untuk menggagalkan perkahwinan Fandi & Salma. Salma dibawa menjauh sehingga akhirnya terlibat dalam satu kes pencurian. Adnan yang kasihan melihat kesusahan Salma, membantu dengan meminjamkan wang. Akankah Salma & Adnan terus berjumpa?

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep22
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Suster El Ep22
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep15
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep232
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Buaya Putih Jatuh Hati
programme.desc: Dara, Ratu Buaya Putih, bertekad menembusi tirai yang menghubungkan alamnya dengan alam manusia, demi mencari mahkotanya. Sementara buaya putih lain berusaha menghalang kerana risikonya yang boleh membawa maut, Dara menerima risiko tersebut dan menolak untuk berundur. Walaupun buaya dianggap sebagai ancaman kepada manusia, Dara berkeras untuk pergi. Sementara itu, Radit memutuskan untuk melarikan diri dari bandar selepas melarikan diri dari kumpulan perusuh. Radit sengaja bersembunyi di sebuah pondok di tepi pantai. Tidak jauh dari pondok Radit berteduh, seekor buaya putih terdampar di pantai dan dikejar oleh beberapa nelayan. Buaya itu rupanya adalah Dara.

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep23
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Lampung Geh Ep2
programme.desc: Dokumentari perjalanan yang merakam keunikan Lampung, daripada keindahan alam semula jadi hingga pelbagai aktiviti menarik.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep233
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Berkah Dari Sebuah Kesabaran Penjual Nasi Gaul Yang Malang
programme.desc: Dia sangat bertuah mempunyai isteri dan anak yang baik seperti Raja, kerana mereka sentiasa menyokong dan membantu menjual nasi campur keliling. Tetapi kebaikan dan kesabaran mereka sentiasa ditindas oleh saudaranya sendiri. Malah, Raja menghidap penyakit paru-paru yang memerlukan wang yang banyak.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa I Hate You I Luv You
programme.desc: Konser Luar Biasa I Hate You I Luv You menghimpunkan barisan penyanyi dangdut terbaik Indonesia untuk menghibur penonton setia Indosiar. Para pedangdut bukan sahaja memukau dengan suara mereka tetapi juga beradu lakonan dalam persembahan penuh emosi dan kejutan.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Return Of The Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesnt last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: One Win
programme.desc: Woo-jin is the newly appointed manager of a girls' volleyball team which is going to disband. The new owner sold all ace players for money and asked the team to win at least once.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: The Priests
programme.desc: After a girl is assaulted, two priests must determine if she was attacked by an evil spirit or a molester.

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: 4Pm
programme.desc: A couple moved to a new house, dreaming of a peaceful country life. But they face a terrifying reality due to their neighbor, who visits them at the same time every day with just silence

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Glorious My Revenge
programme.desc: Detective Ryu lost his beloved son in a hit-and-run accident. As the statute of limitations passed without finding the criminal, he ran into the murderer of his son.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: The Plan Man
programme.desc: An obsessive-compulsive man who plans out every detail of his life came across with a woman with free spirit.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-Ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing she's a target herself.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep1
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: Super Mom Ep12
programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: Ready To Dance Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Season 2 included a street dance youth group from Guangdong, Hong Kong, and Macau, led by Santa Uno, Ao Ziyi, Even Wong, and Robby Huang. Under their supervision, the youths faced challenges in three stages: the initial stage, collaboration stage, and final performance stage. They combined dynamic music and passionate dance to showcase the fusion of traditional Chinese culture with street dance culture.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 3 Ep9
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. programme.title: Her Disguise Ep6
programme.desc: Lin Mange, a righteous and smart medical student, sneaks into the Lu family to avenge her friend Lanlan's bizarre and tragic death and becomes the eldest son's fiance. However, she is discovered by the fox-like second son Lu Haoran, and a series of abuses and counter-killings begin. As she gets along with Lu Haoran, she is attracted by his sincerity and sense of justice beneath his disguise. The two go from suspicion to trust to love and finally find justice and the truth.

programme.title: Go! The Little Knights Ep6
programme.desc: A parenting adventure reality show features six parent-child families on a challenging and exciting cycling journey in Ningxia. Hu Jun, the founder of the Little Knights Training Camp, works closely with the little knights to overcome challenges and difficulties, joined by guests Richie Jen, Li Chen, Kelly Yu, Philip Wu, Tu Songyan, and Jason Fu. They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep44
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.desc: The program focuses new research and development of interactive health science popularization plan; from "treatment" to "prevention", increase the in-depth popularization of medical and health knowledge.

As she gets along with Lu Haoran, she is attracted by his sincerity and sense of justice beneath his disguise. The two go from suspicion to trust to love and finally find justice and the truth.

programme.title: Go! The Little Knights Ep6
programme.desc: A parenting adventure reality show features six parent-child families on a challenging and exciting cycling journey in Ningxia. Hu Jun, the founder of the Little Knights Training Camp, works closely with the little knights to overcome challenges and difficulties, joined by guests Richie Jen, Li Chen, Kelly Yu, Philip Wu, Tu Songyan, and Jason Fu. They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2023) Ep25
programme.desc: Perfect Match is getting back to the classic rules. The male guests will meet and understand the 24 female guests through the sections of answering, judging and selecting. The big data will also help to suggest one of the female guests who are matched. Chen Ming and Huang Lan will join the show and help to interpret love from a new perspective.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep44
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man - The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man - The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep89
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2006
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep24
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep28
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2327
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep26
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4739
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the Kowloon Walled City while fleeing, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom. Bonding with Shin, Twelfth Master and AV, they unite under Tornado's leadership to defend against the villain, Mr Big's assaults, and pledge to protect the safe haven of the Walled City together.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Fight Back to School III
programme.desc: The millionaire, Million Wong , is found dead in a hotel room. Officer Sing Sing (Stephen Chow) is called in when a man is murdered with an ice pick during sexual intercourse. By an uncanny coincidence the man looks identical to Sing so the decision is made to send him in as an undercover again for further investigation. In the same day, he finds himself with a beautiful wife (Anita Mui), an incompetent sidekick (Anthony Wong) and one very unhappy girlfriend (Cheung Man). All this and somehow he still has to try and solve the case!

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, in Hong Kong, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gangsters again in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read and filmed novel in Chinese history, this version is said to be the most successful one. Betty Lohs looks, demeanour and aura in her portrayal of Lin Dai Yu has won her the epithet "Classic Beauty".

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Hsieh Choun, the Black Dragon, is in trouble with the police since Wang Sien Tien's gang is helping them; he is no longer free to conduct his drugs shipments out of the port freely as he used to. He buys more thugs and killers to dispose of the young upstart, and soon Wang is in dire straits, in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Better Together - The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bandit, Max, and George - Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Better Together - The wilds of Zambia are a tough place to live. Here, many animals must come together in groups to help defend territory, protect offspring, find food and overcome predators.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Villains - Meet natures most wanted and see why the baddest of the bad dont get the respect they deserve. Admire the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.title: Planet Weird S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Sidekicks - Unravel strange alliances that ensure mutual success in the wild. Explore the partnership between clownfish and anemones, watch oxpeckers keep savannah residents healthy, and review the quid-pro-poo agreements of dung beetles and pitcher plants.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mini Giants - Elephants, gorillas, rhinos, and bison are among the largest and most imposing land-dwelling mammals, but they all start out as helpless infants. See how babies from each species find their way to becoming giants.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible World - Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger, and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Safari CSI - Everyday in the Luangwa Valley a carcass is sighted. Each body holds the story that lead them to their death. In Safari CSI we investigate what killed three carcasses that have been uncovered...

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Rock Splitter - The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.desc: March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the worlds 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are natures best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Baby Animals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mother's Darlings - Not all infants in the animal kingdom get to have a good mother. But these are the stories of the lucky ones, from a ring-tailed lemur who learns everything from its mom to a tiny orangutan that receives a constant supply of motherly cuddles.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Toto, Banksi, and Lucy - Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical Shores - Explore the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Face flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish as Lizzie investigates why so many strange, deadly creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Africa's Edens - Zambia is home to three very special and different African Edens. The low, hot Luangwa River Valley, the high, dry Liuwa Plain and the cool, wet Kasanka National Park. Defined by the earth on which they sit and shaped by the seasons, each place offers something unique to the wildlife that chooses to live there.

programme.title: Rooted S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Hollow Heart - This is the incredible story of a tree that has been around for eight hundred years that can withstand the harshest conditions and that is more loved by insects, birds and animals than any otherthe enormous Baobab. Rooted on the savannah of Malilangwe Game Reserve in southern Zimbabwe.
